attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The three Air Ambulance helicopters costs just over 5million a year to run. FUEL has risen so when their fixed fuel price reaches its end of term (October)The hourly fuel cost will rise from £140 to £170 an increase of £130,000 per year for the three choppers. Why not make it one of the emergency service's funded by the goverment, like police, fire and nhs, we all pay plenty of tax's!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
